scripts.init: npm run init:services && npm run init:client
scripts.test:all: npm run test:apps-service && npm run test:client
scripts.start:postgre: cd databases/postgre && (docker rm -f fullstack-pilot-postgres >/dev/null 2>&1 || true) && docker build -t fullstack-pilot-postgres:latest . && docker run -d --name fullstack-pilot-postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=fullstack-pilot -e POSTGRES_USER=fullstack -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=fullstack -p 5432:5432 -v $(pwd)/data:/var/lib/postgresql/data fullstack-pilot-postgres:latest
scripts.start:mssql: cd databases/mssql && (docker rm -f fullstack-pilot-mssql >/dev/null 2>&1 || true) && docker build -t fullstack-pilot-mssql:latest . && docker run -d --name fullstack-pilot-mssql -e ACCEPT_EULA=Y -e MSSQL_PID=Developer -e MSSQL_SA_PASSWORD=${MSSQL_SA_PASSWORD:-YourStrong!Passw0rd} -p 1433:1433 -v $(pwd)/data:/var/opt/mssql fullstack-pilot-mssql:latest
